content.raw:
Interesting option.

We plan on supporting acquisition of message descriptors via ign-transport. It seems like a lot of complexity in order to save a relatively small amount of data from being stored in the database. Also, if we don't store descriptors, we loose exact descriptions of the messages which are useful for migrations and introspection.

Maybe we could use dynamic message generation as a fallback feature, sometime in the future.
content.html:
Interesting option.

We plan on supporting acquisition of message descriptors via ign-transport. It seems like a lot of complexity in order to save a relatively small amount of data from being stored in the database. Also, if we don't store descriptors, we loose exact descriptions of the messages which are useful for migrations and introspection.

Maybe we could use dynamic message generation as a fallback feature, sometime in the future.
